topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55218e616368720b9d7a1600#post_55218e616368720b9d7a1600
Thanatos; as much as I fucking despise call of duty I'm going to have to side with everyone else on this: we don't give a shit.

We're not anti-angryjoe; we're not pro-angryjoe; we just don't care.  If your enemy is everyone that doesn't care then your enemy is the entire world's population minus one million.

Do you have a martyrdom complex or something?

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55218ffa63687268e9210500#post_55218ffa63687268e9210500
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]"@ArcticEight":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55218f146368724c4fad0500#post_55218f146368724c4fad0500
But because it's nintendo they are above reproach,[/bq]
No dude; it's that we don't care.

We don't care about your agenda.
We don't care about angryjoe.
Most of us don't even watch angryjoe.
We don't care about whatever his problem is with nintendo.
We don't care about whatever he is going on about.

I don't even have a 3ds or a wiiu; a lot of people don't actually.


Before we all go back to talking about something else: Thanatos make a thread on it instead of posting it here is all I'm asking.

Right now people are talking about hot guys swimming and diebuster.
